name: grassroots
description: Political Campaign Software focused on voter outreach and volunteer management.

scripts.test: cd grassroots-frontend && npm run test && cd ../grassroots-backend && npm run test
scripts.check: npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-frontend && npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-backend && npx eslint .
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "docker compose -f docker/compose.yml up" "npm run --prefix grassroots-frontend dev " "npm run --prefix grassroots-backend start:dev"
scripts.dev:host: npx concurrently "docker compose -f docker/compose.yml up" "npm run --prefix grassroots-frontend dev -- --host" "npm run --prefix grassroots-backend start:dev"
